result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen Antony Caravella

records.addlTxt:
Atty Dalle Molle is prepared to proceed with the Arraignment; waives reading of the information.  Court advises defendant of maximum penalties.  Defendant understands. 
Atty Dalle Molle enters a Not Guilty plea.

BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant. 
Set status
bond continued

10:31 AM Defendant Stephen Antony Caravella appeared by video.  Attorney Claire Dalle Molle appeared by video for Stephen Antony Caravella.  Attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
22TR1278 tracking with 22CF125:
Atty Dalle Molle states that the defendant will be waiving the Prelim today and has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant regarding in-person appearance.  Defendant waives their in-person appearance today & will proceed by zoom. 

Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver of the Prelim.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Juech files the information electronically with the Court.
Status hearing scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status hearing on December 12, 2022 at 11:45 am.
to Appear via Zoom Approved s/CAH

10:09 AM Defendant Stephen Antony Caravella in court.  Attorney Claire Dalle Molle appeared by video for Stephen Antony Caravella.  Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
22TR1278 tracking with 22CF125:
Atty Dalle Molle states that he and the Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading. Court advises defendant of maximum penalties.  Defendant understands. 
Atty Dalle Molle waives time limits and asks for a Prelim to be set.  Defendant agrees.  

BY THE COURT:  Defendant waives time limits for the preliminary hearing. 
Set for Prelim
bond continued
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.

*No contact with Victim 1 or his residence  *No possession of any firearms; any owned firearms should be released to Law Enforcement only  *Maintain Absolute Sobriety, no possession or consumption of any alcohol   *No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license

3:17 PM Defendant Stephen Antony Caravella appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mark Gumz appears as a special appearance on behalf of the defendant for bond. 
Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint.  Court confirms address.  Atty Gumz states that the defendant does not qualify for Public Defender appointment.
Court finds probable cause for the charges for Riverside purposes. 

Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands and is going to get an Attorney.  

Atty Juech requests a $10,000 cash bond with conditions.
Atty Gumz makes bail arguments.

BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $10,000 Cash bond with conditions: 
*No contact with Victim 1 or his residence
*No possession of any firearms; any owned firearms should be released to Law Enforcement only
*Maintain Absolute Sobriety, no possession or consumption of any alcohol 
*No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license
Initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Initial appearance on September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
